text: A lot of directors idealize their leading ladies or turn them into these objects of sexuality and beauty.
author: Diane Kruger

text: I like the idea of accessibility, coming from a lower-middle-class background myself, I feel like beauty and products should be accessible to all women over the world.
author: Diane Kruger

text: Beauty in art is often nothing but ugliness subdued.
author: Jean Rostand

text: What saddens me is the corruption of youth and beauty, and the loss of soul, which is only replaced by money.
author: Lisa Bonet

text: When I think of art I think of beauty. Beauty is the mystery of life. It is not in the eye it is in the mind. In our minds there is awareness of perfection.
author: Agnes Martin
